肾脏健康指标的长期模式可以预测心力衰竭风险他们说，一分预防胜于一分治疗。了解对哪个患者采取哪种预防性治疗无疑可以提高这一效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Long-term-patterns-in-kidney-health-indicators-may-predict-heart-failure-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Long-term-patterns-in-kidney-health-indicators-may-predict-heart-failure-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b9c3361-b605-4c22-b42a-6d7b666da86e Tue, 01 Aug 2023 21:59:56 -0400 Long-term patterns in kidney health indicators may predict heart failure risk

研究为驱动异位骨化的复杂细胞过程提供了新的见解在《Bone Research》杂志于 2023 年 7 月 21 日发表的一项新研究中，约翰·霍普金斯大学的一组研究人员结合谱系追踪和单细胞 RNA 测序 (scRNA-seq)，深入研究了滑膜/肌腱的贡献鞘祖细胞异位骨形成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Study-provides-new-insights-into-the-intricate-cellular-processes-driven-heterotopic-ossification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Study-provides-new-insights-into-the-intricate-cellular-processes-driven-heterotopic-ossification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efb7ccae-e79b-43e4-855d-a4d9e0a81748 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 21:34:00 -0400 Study provides new insights into the intricate cellular processes driving heterotopic ossification

波士顿学院研究人员获得资助研究肠道微生物在 1 型糖尿病中的作用波士顿学院生物学助理教授 Emrah Altindis 获得了 Beatson 基金会提供的为期两年、价值 275,000 美元的资助，用于探索肠道微生物和病毒在触发 1 型糖尿病自身免疫方面的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Boston-College-researcher-receives-grant-to-study-role-of-gut-microbes-in-Type-1-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Boston-College-researcher-receives-grant-to-study-role-of-gut-microbes-in-Type-1-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=742b9092-0fdd-4a3f-afc5-b518f3f3caea Tue, 01 Aug 2023 21:18:50 -0400 Boston College researcher receives grant to study role of gut microbes in Type 1 diabetes
视力问题与痴呆风险增加有关失去清晰视力和失去清晰思考或记忆的能力是与衰老相关的两个最可怕且可预防的健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Vision-problems-linked-to-increased-risk-of-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Vision-problems-linked-to-increased-risk-of-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0ea2bde-aac8-4e0a-bc82-deb53d55675e Tue, 01 Aug 2023 21:16:37 -0400 Vision problems linked to increased risk of dementia
麻省总医院开设首个此类中心，以消除器官移植后的终身免疫抑制麻省总医院 (MGH) 是麻省总医院布里格姆卫生系统的创始成员，正式开设了莱戈雷塔临床移植耐受中心，这是世界上第一个致力于预防移植手术后器官排斥的中心，无需使用终生免疫抑制药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/MGH-opens-first-of-its-kind-center-to-eliminate-lifelong-immunosuppression-after-organ-transplant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/MGH-opens-first-of-its-kind-center-to-eliminate-lifelong-immunosuppression-after-organ-transplant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13c17ff5-a33a-44cf-a25b-aeb4b96183df Tue, 01 Aug 2023 20:59:53 -0400 MGH opens first-of-its-kind center to eliminate lifelong immunosuppression after organ transplant
小剂量阿托品滴眼液不能有效减缓儿童近视加深范德比尔特大学医学中心和美国其他 11 家医院和诊所进行的一项研究表明，使用低剂量阿托品滴眼剂（通常以较高剂量用于治疗懒惰眼）在减缓近视方面并不比安慰剂更好。 ）接受治疗两年的儿童眼睛的进展和伸长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Low-dose-atropine-eyedrops-not- effective-in-slowing-myopia-progression-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Low-dose-atropine-eyedrops-not- effective-in-slowing-myopia-progression-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4926ac2d-c39b-4d34-a556-3dea1f7b23c1 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 20:57:38 -0400 Low-dose atropine eyedrops not effective in slowing myopia progression in children
果糖被认为是导致肥胖的主要途径科罗拉多大学安舒茨医学院的研究人员正式确定了导致肥胖的主要途径：果糖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Fructose-identified-as-central-conduit-to-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Fructose-identified-as-central-conduit-to-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b82656ec-42b9-4c5f-94d9-274d3de446cd Tue, 01 Aug 2023 20:54:10 -0400 Fructose identified as central conduit to obesity
